emails.subject: Urgent: Q4 Budget Review Meeting
emails.body:
Hi,

We need to schedule our Q4 budget review meeting. Can you join us this Friday at 2 PM IST? Please confirm your availability by tomorrow.

We'll be discussing:
- Q4 financial performance
- Budget allocations for next quarter
- Resource planning

Best regards,
Priya Sharma
Finance Manager

emails.subject: Your Weekly AI & ML Updates - January 2024
emails.body:
Hello!

Here are this week's top stories in AI and Machine Learning:

1. New breakthroughs in LLM technology
2. Google announces Gemini 2.0
3. OpenAI releases GPT-5 beta

emails.subject: Action Required: Project Deliverable Review
emails.body:
Hello,

I need you to review the project deliverables document and provide feedback by end of this week (January 19th). This is high priority as we have a client presentation next Monday.

Please focus on:
- Technical specifications
- Timeline feasibility
- Resource requirements

Let me know if you need any clarification.

Thanks,
Raj Kumar
Project Manager

emails.subject: Sprint Planning Meeting - January 22nd
emails.body:
Team,

Our next sprint planning meeting is scheduled for January 22nd at 11 AM IST. Please come prepared with:
- Completed tasks from current sprint
- Blockers and dependencies
- Proposed tasks for next sprint

Meeting link: https://meet.startup.io/sprint-planning

See you there!
Amit

emails.subject: URGENT: Verify Your Account Now!
emails.body:
Dear Customer,

We detected suspicious activity on your account. Click here immediately to verify: http://suspicious-link.com/verify

Your account will be suspended in 24 hours if you don't act now.

This is an automated message. Do not reply.

emails.subject: Critical Bug in Production - Immediate Attention Needed
emails.body:
URGENT!

We've discovered a critical bug in the payment processing module. Users are unable to complete transactions. This needs immediate attention.

Please:
1. Investigate the issue ASAP
2. Deploy hotfix by end of day
3. Update the status dashboard

This is affecting 15% of our users. Priority: HIGHEST

Vijay
CTO

emails.body:
Hi,

Could you please review my pull request #342? It's for the new feature module.

emails.subject: Question About API Integration
emails.body:
Hello,

I have a question about integrating your API with our system. Specifically:

1. What's the rate limit for API calls?
2. Do you support webhook notifications?
3. What authentication method should we use?

Could you provide some documentation or schedule a quick call?

Thanks,
Meera Nair
Technical Lead

emails.subject: Database Migration - Action Required
emails.body:
Hi,

We need to perform a database migration this weekend (January 13-14). This requires:

1. Backup current database (by Friday EOD)
2. Review migration script (by Thursday)
3. Be available during migration window (Saturday 2 AM - 4 AM IST)

This is critical for the new feature release. Please confirm your availability.

Deepak
DevOps Lead

emails.body:
Hi everyone,

emails.subject: URGENT: Server Downtime Scheduled
emails.body:
CRITICAL NOTICE!

We're experiencing server issues and need to perform emergency maintenance tonight at 11 PM IST.

Action required:
- Save all your work
- Complete any critical tasks before 10:30 PM
- Expect 2-3 hours of downtime

This is urgent and cannot be postponed. Please acknowledge receipt.

Rohan
Infrastructure Team

emails.subject: Follow-up: Project Discussion
emails.body:
Hello,

Following up on our previous conversation about the project timeline. I wanted to check if you've had a chance to review the proposal.

Let me know if you have any questions or would like to schedule a call to discuss further.
